title: Textile
medium:
Medium: 
Technique: 4&1 Weft satin. Stripe of plain weave at one edge of a, both edges of b.
dimensions: A. Warp: 48.5cm (19in.). Weft:57.8cm (22 3/4in.). B. Warp: 46cm (18in.). Weft: 58cm (22 3/4in.).
description: Irregularly shaped pieces with shiny surface. Color appears as rusty black because of a brown warp and black weft. Removed from two chairs belonging to the museum.
